Tidy a dagitty object

Source: R/tidy_dag.R
tidy_dagitty.Rd

Tidy a dagitty object

tidy_dagitty(.dagitty, seed = NULL, layout = "nicely", ...)

Arguments

.dagitty

a dagitty
seed

a numeric seed for reproducible layout generation
layout

a layout available in ggraph. See ggraph::create_layout() for details.
...

optional arguments passed to ggraph::create_layout()

Value

a tidy_dagitty object

Examples

library(dagitty)
library(ggplot2)

dag <- dagitty( "dag {
  Y <- X <- Z1 <- V -> Z2 -> Y
  Z1 <- W1 <-> W2 -> Z2
  X <- W1 -> Y
  X <- W2 -> Y
  X [exposure]
  Y [outcome]
  }")

tidy_dagitty(dag)
#> # A DAG with 7 nodes and 12 edges
#> #
#> # Exposure: X
#> # Outcome: Y
#> #
#> # A tibble: 13 x 8
#>    name      x     y direction to     xend  yend circular
#>    <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <fct>     <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <lgl>   
#>  1 V      7.54 10.2  ->        Z1     6.16 10.0  FALSE   
#>  2 V      7.54 10.2  ->        Z2     7.68  8.78 FALSE   
#>  3 W1     6.17  9.00 ->        X      5.60  8.68 FALSE   
#>  4 W1     6.17  9.00 ->        Y      6.39  7.90 FALSE   
#>  5 W1     6.17  9.00 ->        Z1     6.16 10.0  FALSE   
#>  6 W1     6.17  9.00 <->       W2     6.86  8.28 FALSE   
#>  7 W2     6.86  8.28 ->        X      5.60  8.68 FALSE   
#>  8 W2     6.86  8.28 ->        Y      6.39  7.90 FALSE   
#>  9 W2     6.86  8.28 ->        Z2     7.68  8.78 FALSE   
#> 10 X      5.60  8.68 ->        Y      6.39  7.90 FALSE   
#> 11 Z1     6.16 10.0  ->        X      5.60  8.68 FALSE   
#> 12 Z2     7.68  8.78 ->        Y      6.39  7.90 FALSE   
#> 13 Y      6.39  7.90 NA        NA    NA    NA    FALSE   

tidy_dagitty(dag, layout = "fr") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, xend = xend, yend = yend)) +
    geom_dag_node() +
    geom_dag_text() +
    geom_dag_edges() +
    theme_dag()
